common.company_slogan: Personalized videos from your favorite celebrities

how.find_desc: Browse thousands of stars offering personalized videos.
how.tell_desc: During checkout, you’ll provide the details the celeb will need to make the perfect personalized video.
how.get_desc: Celebs have up to 7 days to complete your request. When it’s ready, we’ll send it directly to you.
how.share_desc: Send the video to friends and family and don’t forget to capture their priceless reactions.

book.money_back_desc: We will always provide a full refund, if the talent doesn’t respond.
book.stepper_pick_desc: Browse thousands of stars offering personalized videos.
book.stepper_write_desc: The more details you give, the more personalized your video will be.
book.stepper_pay_desc: Choose your delivery speed and enter your payment information.
book.video_instruction_placeholder: Once an occasion is selected some hints will show up here.
book.scroll_up: Scroll up to check all the errors ⬆︎
book.name_validate: Name must be at least 3 characters
book.instruction_validate: Instruction must be at least 20 characters
book.email_desc: Your completed video will be sent to you via email.
book.email_verification_failed_desc: Something went wrong, try a bit later.
book.email_verification_invalid_desc: Code must be identical to emailed code
book.payment_desc: You will be forwarded to the payment page.
book.failed_desc: Something went wrong, try a bit later.

order.excited: Get excited! Your request is on its way
order.check: Check your email. We've sent you a confirmation to
order.when_complete: When your request is completed, we’ll email you a link to view, share, or download your video.
